text: Kujula Kadphises' conquest of Greater Bactria was when the first Kushan Emperor who conquered the Guissar mountains and subjugated western Bactria. ==Further informations== Some of the statues of the Khalchayan palatial site in Bactria, dated circa 50 CE, probably corresponded to the rule of Kujula Kadphises. == References == Category:Kushan Empire Category:Wars involving Asia Category:1st-century conflicts
title: Kujula Kadphises' conquest of Greater Bactria
